summary: This is a playable race fit for pure hunters. Unique abilities and powers, and is not over powered or immersion breaking.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=peru][size=48][Short Description][/color][/size]
This is a race that I made for hunters. They are called Gralkin and they are closely related to Bosmer.

[size=48][color=pink][Remember To Endorse!!] [/color][/size]
[color=deeppink][Please notify me about any errors. Please feedback and endorse if you like the mod.][/color]


[size=48][color=palegreen][Back Story][/size][/color]
The Gralkin come from the Forest of Valenwood. They are very closely related to Bosmer. The Gralkin are a mix of Bosmer and an unknown race that is now extinct. The unknown race gave them special abilities like being able to spot predators and see in the dark. The Bosmer genes naturally tried to eliminate the ability to spot predators, but was unsuccessful. That made the lesser power have a down side of taking away health. The Bosmer allowed the Gralkin to be very good hunters of all things. Gralkin normally aren't assassins, but can make pretty good ones. The Gralkin's love of the forest creates a high weakness to fire. Gralkins also love to swim.

[size=48][color=orangered][Overview][/size][/color]
Archery +10
Light Armor +5
One-Handed +5
Smithing +5
Alchemy +5
Speech +5
Greater Power: Gralkin Lung: You can hold your breath underwater for one minute. (I know it doesn't seem very long, but in Skyrim it is)
Ability: Night Vision- Works the same way as "Night Eye"
Ability: Enhanced Senses- Spot out living creatures though walls, at the cost of health.
Disease/Ability: 70% weaker to fire.

[size=48][color=chocolate][Compatibility][/size][/color]
Should be compatible with everything. No files are required.

[size=48][color=khaki][Bugs!][/size][/color]
None found so far.


[size=48][color=slateblue][About This Mod][/size][/color]
This is my second mod ever made. I am very proud of my work and I love to here feedback. This is a race mod that basically makes a new playable race that is a lot like a "Bosmer". But, instead of a scout, the "Gralkin" is more of a hunter.

[color=forestgreen][size=48][Change-log] [/color][/size]
Version 3- changed the weakness to fire from 70% to 50%
Version 2- Deleted all Skyre based items for easier updates and increased the health that is taken when you use "Enhanced Senses"
Version 1- Release Skyre version and non-Skyre version.

[size=48][color=darkorange] [Credits][/color][/size]
Skyre
Bethesda

[size=24][color=darkseagreen][Recommended Mods!][/size][/color]
Skyrim redone- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286/? [for wayfarer]
Predator Vision- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22274/? [better lesser power]
HunterBorn- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/? [for hunting prices etc]
Frostfall- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163/? [for a more realistic hunter]
Trade and Barter- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34612/? [for selling your prey][/center]
author: uriah12g

files.name: Gralkin Race
files.changelogHtml:
Deleted all Skyre based items for easier updates.
Increased the health that is taken when you use "Enhanced Senses" from 15 to 40 to make the race more balanced.

files.name: Gralkin Race V3
files.changelogHtml: Changed the weakness to fire from 70% to 50%
